creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: half moon shaped disk with incised floral and bird motifs on a pebbled ground; eleven horn shaped pendants; rope like chain wrapped around neck piece for approximately 4" on each end; back center section of neck piece is plain; loops at end of disk attach neck piece to disk
dimension: 17 5/16 x 11 15/16 x 13/16 in. (43.97 x 30.32 x 2.06 cm) (including horn shaped pendants)
title: Torque
